content.prompt:
© Breamore House, Hampshire, UK/Bridgeman Images

The work shown can be attributed to

choices.label: Johannes Vermeer, because of the depiction of a softly lit domestic scene
Diego Velázquez, because of the subject choice of a family portrait
William Hogarth, because of the satirical content combined with a genre scene
Juan Rodríguez Juárez, because of the subject choice of a casta painting

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
